00022 #include "surveyor_driver.h"
00023 
00024 // factory creation function
00025 Driver* Surveyor_Init(ConfigFile *cf, int section) {
00026         return ((Driver *)(new Surveyor(cf, section))); 
00027 }
00028 
00029 // Registration
00030 void Surveyor_Register(DriverTable *table) {
00031         table->AddDriver("surveyor", Surveyor_Init);
00032 } 
00033 
00038 Surveyor::Surveyor(ConfigFile *cf, int section) 
00039  : Driver(cf, section, true, PLAYER_MSGQUEUE_DEFAULT_MAXLEN) { 
00040         memset(&this->position_addr, 0, sizeof(player_devaddr_t));
00041         memset(&this->camera_addr, 0, sizeof(player_devaddr_t)); 
00042         memset(&this->ir_addr, 0, sizeof(player_devaddr_t));
00043         memset(&this->dio_addr, 0, sizeof(player_devaddr_t));
00044 
00045         // Create a position?
00046         if (cf->ReadDeviceAddr(&(this->position_addr), section, "provides",
00047                                 PLAYER_POSITION2D_CODE, -1, NULL) == 0) {
00048                 if (this->AddInterface(this->position_addr) != 0) { 
00049                         PLAYER_ERROR("Could not add Position2D interface for SRV-1");
00050                         this->SetError(-1); 
00051                         return;
00052                 } 
00053         } 
00054 
00055         // Create a camera? 
00056         if (cf->ReadDeviceAddr(&(this->camera_addr), section, "provides",
00057                                 PLAYER_CAMERA_CODE, -1, NULL) == 0) {
00058 
00059                 const char *imagetype = cf->ReadString(section, "image_size", "320x240");
00060                 if (imagetype[0] == '3') {
00061                         this->setup_image_mode = SRV1_IMAGE_BIG;
00062                 } else if (imagetype[0] == '1') {
00063                         this->setup_image_mode = SRV1_IMAGE_MED;
00064                 } else {
00065                         this->setup_image_mode = SRV1_IMAGE_SMALL;
00066                 }
00067                 if (this->AddInterface(this->camera_addr) != 0) {
00068                         PLAYER_ERROR("Could not add Camera interface for SRV-1");
00069                         this->SetError(-1);
00070                         return;
00071                 }
00072         }
00073         
00074         // TODO: Implement others?  Add here.
00075         
00076         this->portname = cf->ReadString(section, "port", "/dev/ttyUSB0");
00077 
00078         this->srvdev = NULL;
00079 
00080                // Message for checking status:
00081                 printf("\nCARLOS: constructor is done!");
00082 } 
00083 
00084 
00085 int Surveyor::Setup() {
00086         this->srvdev = srv1_create(this->portname);
00087 
00088         if (!srv1_init(this->srvdev)) { 
00089                 srv1_destroy(this->srvdev);
00090                 this->srvdev = NULL; 
00091                 PLAYER_ERROR("could not connect to SRV-1");
00092                 return -1;
00093         }
00094 
00095         this->srvdev->image_mode = this->setup_image_mode;
00096         printf("CARLOS: image_mode = '%c' \n", this->srvdev->image_mode );
00097   // Start the device thread; spawns a new thread and executes
00098   // Surveyor::Main(), which contains the main loop for the driver.
00099         this->StartThread(); 
00100 
00101         // Message for checking status:
00102         printf("CARLOS: setup is done!");
00103 
00104         return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 int Surveyor::Shutdown() { 
00108         this->StopThread(); 
00109 
00110         srv1_destroy(this->srvdev);
00111         this->srvdev = NULL;
00112         return 0; 
00113 } 
00114 
00115 void Surveyor::Main() { 
00116         for (;;) { 
00117                 printf("\nCARLOS: before Processing Messages()\n");
00118                 this->ProcessMessages(); 
00119                 printf("\nCARLOS: after Processing Messages()\n");
00120 
00121                 if (!srv1_read_sensors(this->srvdev)) {
00122                         PLAYER_ERROR("failed to retrieve sensors from SRV-1");
00123                         srv1_destroy(this->srvdev);
00124                         return;
00125                 }
00126                 printf("\nCARLOS: before Publishing()\n");
00127 
00128                 // Update position2d data;
00129                 player_position2d_data_t posdata; 
00130                 memset(&posdata, 0, sizeof(posdata)); 
00131 
00132                 posdata.vel.px = this->srvdev->vx;
00133                 posdata.vel.pa = this->srvdev->va;
00134 
00135        this->Publish(this->position_addr, PLAYER_MSGTYPE_DATA, PLAYER_POSITION2D_DATA_STATE, (void*)&posdata, sizeof(posdata), NULL);
00136        printf("\nCARLOS: after Publishing()\n");
00137 
00138                 // Camera data;
00139                 player_camera_data_t camdata;
00140                 memset(&camdata, 0, sizeof(camdata));
00141 
00142                 switch (this->srvdev->image_mode) {
00143                         case SRV1_IMAGE_SMALL:
00144                                 camdata.width = 80;
00145                                 camdata.height = 64;
00146                                 break;
00147                         case SRV1_IMAGE_MED:
00148                                 camdata.width = 160;
00149                                 camdata.height = 128;
00150                                 break;
00151                         case SRV1_IMAGE_BIG:
00152                                 camdata.width = 320;
00153                                 camdata.height = 240;
00154                                 break;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 camdata.fdiv = 1;
00158                 camdata.bpp = 24;
00159                 camdata.format = PLAYER_CAMERA_FORMAT_RGB888;
00160                 camdata.compression = PLAYER_CAMERA_COMPRESS_JPEG;
00161 
00162            printf("Surveyor::Main(): frame_size = %d\n",  this->srvdev->frame_size);
00163       printf("Surveyor::Main(): image_mode = '%c'\n",  this->srvdev->image_mode);
00164 
00165 
00166                 if (this->srvdev->image_mode != SRV1_IMAGE_OFF) {
00167                         camdata.image_count = this->srvdev->frame_size;
00168 
00169                         if (camdata.image == NULL) {
00170                            camdata.image = (uint8_t *)malloc(camdata.image_count);
00171                    } else {
00172                       camdata.image = (uint8_t *)realloc(camdata.image, camdata.image_count);
00173                    }
00174                         memcpy(camdata.image, this->srvdev->frame, camdata.image_count);
00175          printf("\nCARLOS: before Publishing CAMERA()\n");
00176 
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 this->Publish(this->camera_addr, PLAYER_MSGTYPE_DATA, PLAYER_CAMERA_DATA_STATE, (void*)&camdata, sizeof(camdata), NULL);
00180       printf("\nCARLOS: after Publishing CAMERA()\n");
00181 
00182                 // TODO: add other interfaces' fills.
00183                 
00184                 usleep(SRVMIN_CYCLE_TIME);
00185         } 
00186 }
00187 
00188 int Surveyor::ProcessMessage(QueuePointer &resp_queue, player_msghdr *hdr, void *data) {
00189 
00190       printf("\nCARLOS: I'm in ProcessMessage\n");
00191 
00192       if (Message::MatchMessage(hdr, PLAYER_MSGTYPE_CMD,
00193                                 PLAYER_POSITION2D_CMD_VEL, this->position_addr)) {
00194         printf("\nCARLOS: I'm Matching Message\n");
00195 
00196                 // position motor command
00197                 player_position2d_cmd_vel_t position_cmd;
00198                 position_cmd = *(player_position2d_cmd_vel_t *) data;
00199                 PLAYER_MSG2(2,"sending motor commands %f %f", position_cmd.vel.px, position_cmd.vel.pa);
00200                 
00201                 if (!srv1_set_speed(this->srvdev, position_cmd.vel.px, position_cmd.vel.pa)) {
00202                         PLAYER_ERROR("failed to set speed on SRV-1");
00203                   }
00204 
00205                 return 0; 
00206         }
00207       else if (Message::MatchMessage(hdr, PLAYER_MSGTYPE_REQ,
00208               PLAYER_POSITION2D_REQ_MOTOR_POWER,
00209               this->position_addr))
00210         {
00211           this->Publish(this->position_addr, resp_queue,
00212              PLAYER_MSGTYPE_RESP_ACK, PLAYER_POSITION2D_REQ_MOTOR_POWER);
00213           return 0;
00214         }
00215       else if(Message::MatchMessage(hdr,PLAYER_MSGTYPE_REQ,
00216                                       PLAYER_POSITION2D_REQ_GET_GEOM,
00217                                       this->position_addr))
00218         {
00219           /* Return the robot geometry. */
00220           memset(&pos_geom, 0, sizeof pos_geom);
00221           // Assume that it turns about its geometric center, so zeros are fine
00222 
00223           pos_geom.size.sl = SRV1_DIAMETER;
00224           pos_geom.size.sw = SRV1_DIAMETER;
00225 
00226           this->Publish(this->position_addr, resp_queue,
00227                             PLAYER_MSGTYPE_RESP_ACK,
00228                             PLAYER_POSITION2D_REQ_GET_GEOM,
00229                             (void*)&pos_geom, sizeof pos_geom, NULL);
00230           return 0;
00231         }
00232         else {
00233                 return -1; 
00234         } 
00235         // No commands / requests for cameras.
00236 }

00241 /* need the extern to avoid C++ name-mangling  */
00242 extern "C" {
00243   int player_driver_init(DriverTable* table)
00244   {
00245     puts("Surveyor driver initializing");
00246     Surveyor_Register(table);
00247     puts("Surveyor driver done");
00248     return(0);
00249   }
00250 }
